meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Jaech Ken Frier John Hunt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2230.

td.p: Jeff Jaech, a college student from Riverside, California
Ken Frier, a director of foreign exchange originally from Hendersonville, North Carolina
John Hunt, a jazz musician from San Francisco, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,601)

tr.td: U.S. GEOGRAPHY
FAMOUS CANADIANS
MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS
ROCKS & MINERALS
FOOD & DRINK
STARTS WITH "K"
